overview: Have you ever seen a gorgeous girl with a great ass climbing stairs in a short skirt? Have you ever tried to sneak a peek up that skirt but didn't get a good long look because you were afraid you'd get caught? John "Buttman" Stagliano brings this fantasy and others to life as he takes the risk.  He looks up Lauren Brice's shorts while she's on a ladder., Brandy Alexandre's skirts on the stairs, and Sabrina Dawn's bikini on the beach.  With the words, "I can make you a star," he gets away with a lot more!
title: Buttman's Bend Over Babes
